title: Victoria Beckham denies she's moving to US as David starts work on football team
text:

Victoria Beckham is not moving to the US to be with husband David .

As the former England footballer prepares to start work on his football team in Miami, a source close to Victoria revealed to Mirror Online that "there are no plans for the family to move to the US."

While her business has rooted her to the UK in the past, Victoria, 45, was thought by some fans to be considering a move to the US as the prospect of a trans-Atlantic marriage loomed.

An insider had told Heat magazine that while her business is in Britain, Victoria would make her marriage her top priority - leading some fans to believe that she'd make the move.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

The source said: "She's spent the last ten years working to build her empire, but has now admitted that, while she is still dedicated to it, her marriage is a bigger priority.

"So, if David is going to be based in Miami, then that's where she wants to be, too."

David's been working on his Inter Miami side which is set to join the cream of the crop of American soccer.

(Image: Twitter)

(Image: Twitter)

The side, and their eagerly awaited £750 million stadium, will join Major League Soccer in 2020, with the stadium following probably between a year and two years afterwards.

Victoria, meanwhile, has been raising breast cancer awareness with the help of social media.

Her huge online following was shown snaps of Victoria, David and their three kids each adorned with the pink breast cancer awareness badge.

(Image: BBC)

From Victoria's Spice Girl days and David's time with Manchester United , the pair have been an iconic celebrity couple.

They're both incredibly busy people and their marriage has seen its ups and downs - but Victoria is very open about how her and David have stood the test of time during those 20 years.

"The kids are our priority," she revealed, "Everything we do revolves around the kids. We both work really hard, we love what we do professionally.

"We appreciate each other. We are very lucky to have found each other and we are growing together.

"It was love at first sight. It was love at first sight."
description: A source close to Victoria said that she has no plans to move across the pond as David starts work on Inter Miami, the team he owns
